templates.name: permanent-tasks
templates.title: TerraBrasilis complementary jobs.
templates.description: Used to make some products that need runs only once.
templates.note: This stack is mandatory and represents the complementary TerraBrasilis tasks.

templates.name: backup-tasks
templates.title: TerraBrasilis database backup jobs.
templates.description: Used to make backups of PostgreSQL, MongoDB and other databases.
templates.note: This stack is mandatory to produce the recovery artifacts.

templates.name: on-demand-tools
templates.title: TerraBrasilis on demand tools.
templates.description: A collection of tools triggered manually.

templates.name: manager-apps
templates.title: The Manager Apps stack for production.
templates.description: The Apps to allow manage the resources like PostgreSQL databases.
templates.note: This stack is optional and serves to manage the resources on TerraBrasilis cluster.
